contents.title: Bachelors of Engineering â€“ Information Technology
Software Engineer - Frontend
contents.description:
Working in a small team of highly talented developers at Webfleet Solutions. Each member of the Team owns a module of the product where the owner is responsible for maintaining it, reviewing PR's, writing End-To-End and unit tests and production deployment support.

Technical Environment: React 16.3/16.8, Redux, WebSocket, CSS3, Docker, Puppet, Jenkins CI/CD, Selenium

  • Owns one of the modules in the sophisticated fleet tracking app.
  • Using agile methodologies to implement the latest features - creating epic, breaking down in user stories, and implement it with the definition of done.
  • Supporting the migration from React 16.3 to React 16.8, implementing the latest features using react hooks, react-router 5.
  • Highly focussed on Unit and End-To-End test, using a TDD approach with the help of tools like Jest & Enzyme.
  • Deep understanding of libraries used to render maps like Google and TomTom.
  • Collaboration with the Product Owner and Design Team to understand their vision and drive the development in that direction.

contents.title: Software Developer - Frontend (Advanced)
contents.description:
Worked in Product and Delivery Team as Senior Front End Engineer, Have in-depth knowledge of Product UI. Currently, leading the Development of Digital Bills for New Telecom Clients. Received Feedback from Manager on Linkedin as well.

Technical Environment: React, Hooks, Redux, Redux-thunk, HOC, Context API, ES6, Redux, SCSS, Bootstrap, Webpack, Axios, REST, JSON

  • Leading the design and development of Digital Bills for Telecom clients.
  • Implemented the TDD approach. Using Jest and Enzyme for Unit Testing.
  • Very close collaboration with client and solution architect to better understand the needs of the customer
  • Worked briefly on responsive email (bills) designs for clients.
  • Briefly worked in the Product Team - Contributing towards the development of new features in Product UI.
  • Developed Billing Operations Dashboard from Scratch - features include dynamic pagination, responsive table with the custom actions, timer, sorting and filtering, SPA using react-router, Redux store design with redux-thunk.
  • Played an important role in the migration of various UI components from AngularJS to React. I had written a blog about the process on the company's engineering blog portal.
  • Provided guidance on front-end strategies, standards, and technology decisions.
  • Implemented custom function for a responsive design using SASS.
  • Deep understanding of React and Redux life-cycle hooks and workflow.
  • Keep up with evolving web technologies and best practices including HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, React and Redux.

contents.title: Software Developer - Frontend (Experienced)
contents.description:
Designed and developed web-based components for a variety of applications in an agile development setting.

Technical Environment: React, Angular, ES6, Redux, SCSS, Bootstrap, Webpack, Axios, REST, JSON

  • Self Learned Front-End Technologies to kick off my new career in UI Development
  • Designed and Developed various functional component for Telecom client's Care, Self-Care and Portal sites.
  • Built full-stack web applications in React/Redux.
  • Implement responsive registration pages using JavaScript, Angular, Bootstrap, and SCSS.
  • Designed and Developed various standalone components to React and Redux like Auto-complete Search-bar, Registration forms, Compare Product table, etc.
  • Keep up with evolving web technologies and best practices including HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, React and Redux.

contents.title: Software Developer - Java
contents.description:
Analyzed customer requirement to provide solution on Development of Offline ( Postpaid ) Mediation System for various telecom client. As a part of the process had collaborated third-party application team and client business team. 

Technical Environment: Java, Unix, Maven, Perforce, SQL, Business knowledge of Telecom Billing System.

  • Collaborated with third-party application team and client business team to sign-off the IDD's.
  • Development of Offline ( Postpaid ) Mediation System for various Telecom Client.
  • Working in Mediation Team, helped me gained Industry Standard knowledge of processes, frameworks, and tools e.g. Rally, Perforce, Diameter Protocol, Telecom Rating.
  • Had conducted a week-long training for one of the clients ( in Ireland ) on usage and benefits of the product.
  • Responsibility also includes adding business logic to network services by enabling service providers to perform sophisticated real-time service management based on information collected from (and correlated among) multiple network elements and BSS/OSS systems.
  • Worked on various Line of Business for Mediation System like LTE, VoLTE, SMS, MMS, VOICE, DATA, Dropped Call and converting all Event Data Records into various formats like CSV and Binary format for Big Data and Revenue Assurance.

content.description:
Passionate Front End Engineer (Senior) with over 6 years of experience in Software Development and customer interaction. An avid learner with a proven record of excelling in various roles.

Shubham was working as a Front End Dev Lead on a BriteBill project for one of the customers I was leading and he has shown dedication, innovation, diligence and creativity on all his tasks, managing his work proactively. I would recommend Shubham to any company which needs excellent Front End developer with eye for details

-- Feedback on Linkedin.

I had also contributed many projects on Github involving the latest trends in the React ecosystem.

contents.title: Material-UI
contents.description:
• I have worked on a various personal and commercial project based on Material-UI
  • Customized Material-UI theme (using JSS) as per the project requirement.

contents.title: ELK Stack Implementation
contents.description:
Skill Set: Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana, Java, Shell Script.

  • Amdocs mediation processes thousands of events (VOICE, SMS, MMS, DATA, etc.) every day, for various clients daily.
  • Implemented an Idea to make sense of all this data (events which are rated, failed and recycled). i.e. Visualizing and Analyzing all the data on web-based GUI - Kibana

contents.title: HiPo (Hi-Potential Employee)
contents.description: Awarded to the employees - who shows High Potential in areas other than their usual work.

contents.title: Outstanding Performer
contents.description: Highest Degree of award given to the Employee for exceptional contribution towards the project.
